features: 【 2 in 1 Cervical Neck Pillow 】 This pillow is different from traditional pillows, it combines a Neck roll Pillow and a Cervical Pillow in One. The unique concave shape will fit the neck and will fill the gap with the neck and gently stretch the neck. Neck sleeping pillow provides neck support and relief for all sleepers and neck pain. Ideal for cervical spine stretched, neck pain relief.

【 Ergonomic Design Cervical Pillow 】 The cervical contour design perfectly aligns your head, neck, shoulder, and back, neck support pillow give you good support and reduces the stress in the cervical vertebra and spine, thus effectively relief muscle tension. Perfect curvature helps the vertebrae stay relaxed, keeps neck and shoulders aligned, and maintains the natural curvature of the spine, so the neck traction pillow can be used as a posture pillow to adjust cervical curvature.

【 Neck Pillow for Sleeping 】 Neck support pillow for sleeping helps relieve the debilitating effects of sciatica, arthritis, headache, post-surgery pain, helps the vertebrae stay relaxed, keeps the neck and shoulders aligned, and maintains the natural curvature of the spine.

【 Memory Foam Neck Pillow 】 The neck pillow core is made of memory foam with a slow rebound feature, durable and keeps shape without getting flat or become hard for long time use. Perfectly aligns the neck, preventing the impact caused by head downward, support your head, neck, and shoulder properly.
【 Washable Pillowcase 】 Our neck pillow comes with a premium, skin friendly hypoallergenic, removable zipper breathable pillowcase, easy cleaning.
* It is normal for some people to experience discomfort during the initial use. You can first use it for 5 minutes, and then increase the time after adapting. Gradually transition to overnight use.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: When washing, remove the outer pillowcase for cleaning, the color of other clothes may be transferred to the product, so please do not wash it together with other items, and then store it in a ventilated and dry place. (The inner pillow cannot be cleaned)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Usage: 1. Place this cervical pillow flat on the bed, sofa or flat place you want to use. 2. Adjust the position and align the neck and pillows, then completely relax the neck, lying down, naturally hanging. 3. Make sure there is no gap between the pillow and your shoulders, and then you can lay on it to fall asleep. Notes: 1. If you feel uncomfortable at first, this is normal, please wait 1-3 days to get used to it. 2. When washing, remove the outer pillowcase for cleaning, the color of other clothes may be transferred to the product, so please do not wash it together with other items, and then store it in a ventilated and dry place. (The inner pillow cannot be cleaned) 3. When the weather gets cold, the pillow will harden. After receiving the pillov.it is recommended to put it in a warm room for about 24 hours, it will become soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You do have to get used to it, but great for travel!
reviews.reviewText: I send this to my sister's house when I realized I'd be there frequently. At home I use a Core pillow. What I like about this one is that it is the functional half of the large Core pillow. I could pack it back and forth if I needed to. It does take some getting used to if you've never used such a thing before, so expect to use it for just a couple hours a night for several days, going back to whatever pillow you are used to until you can go the whole night on it. I like that my head can fall back while the pillow is supportive enough to hold my neck. The irregular shape allows you to choose more or less height for your neck. I find I can even sleep on the end of it when I turn to my side.If I get tired of my Core pillow, I may buy one for home use as well. It is also a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s great for when I sleep on my back, but I wake up with a sore neck and shoulders if I roll on my side in the night. The pillow case fell apart almost immediately. But overall, I’ve had a good experience with this pillow. My chiropractor said my neck hasn’t been as bad as usual. I have a reverse curve and it causes me constant pain. This won’t fix it but it helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was the first cervical roll type pillow I ever got myself, and I hate that I didn’t buy it sooner.My posture and the sedentary nature of my job leaves me with insanely tight neck muscles that trigger wicked migraines and jaw aches.Whenever I feel even just a little tightness in my neck, I use this instead of my normal pillow at night, and wake up feeling worlds better!The included pillowcase is nice and soft, as well, which is a huge bonus.Because the “pillow” is made of this silicone/rubbery type material, it did have a bit of a weird smell when I opened it up for the first time. I left it to air out while I was at work, and by the time I got home, the smell had disappeared and I haven’t smelled it since.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works great but cover is unacceptable
reviews.reviewText: This product is not a memory foam product...in a good way. I have tried over a dozen roll/cervical pillows of this type to relive my neck and shoulder pain and this product works. I place this pillow on top of a very shallow conventional pillow and it has really made a difference. The hard foam keeps its shape and provides the support I need. However, the cover got a hole in it the first time I washed it and looks very cheap as a result. The seller needs to include a better cover and sell some additional covers that fit this unique shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's helped a lot!
reviews.reviewText: This pillow has helped me get a great nights sleep! Neck stiffness is no more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels great so far
reviews.reviewText: I usually never look at the literature for products but did for this. It shows an 8 minute cervical stretch with the low sides at your shoulders and 8 hour sleep position flipped with the high side at your shoulders.I don’t have spinal issues but was looking for a pillow to slightly tilt my chin up to prevent further neck wrinkles an anatomically your airway is more open this way (similar to when you tilt the chin to give rescue breaths for CPR)I like the size and know if I want to take this traveling I can since hotel pillows are usually all fluff and no support.The firmness so far doesn’t feel too soft or firm but I’ll have to give it a few nights of sleep testing to see. So far initial impression is good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Hard as a rock memory foam (updated review)
reviews.reviewText: Wow, this is the hardest memory foam I’ve ever felt. It feels like a hard surface with no give unless you try really hard to press into it. It’s the weirdest, hardest memory foam product I’ve ever felt. I don’t believe I can return it now that I’ve opened it - this one will sadly go in the dump. If you are looking for memory foam with zero give and feels like a rock, then this is for you. If you are looking for and expecting the usual give of standard memory foam, keep looking. I do not recommend this and was very surprised by it.UPDATE: Although I won't change the star rating for the product itself, I will say that the customer service from the seller was TOP NOTCH, their customer service deserves 5 stars. They saw my review and offered a refund. It's rare to see such great customer service. Because of the service they offered, I will absolutely consider buying from this seller again. Thank you seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This makes my neck feel great. I have a disc protrusion around C5, and this pillow functions great to relieve pain while sleeping. But, two things:One, it's now 5 months after buying it. I've washed the cover twice, and had other covers OVER it to protect it, and it has a hole in it after only 5 months and minimal washing. The fabric is stretchy and moves around a lot. Good for reinserting the memory foam, but there's a lot of creep from where it belongs. Also, I baby my things, but this still didn't last long.Two, it is really hard to keep clean. The memory foam makes me sweat, which contributes to the smell. I tried carpet powder, baking soda, mild detergent. Keep in mind, I can't use it for a few days while cleaning.So...feels great on my messed up neck. Cover hasn't lasted long. Could be hot because memory foam. Could have trouble with smell because memory foam.
Bought this pillow for my husband who was having some neck pain. It is the perfect size and fits nicely under the head and supports the neck. I am very happy with my purchase.
lo uso par ala comu en mis piernas par adormir y que mis rodillas no topen cuando duermos de lado lo uso en sillas par ami espalada baja es un comodin
La vdd es muy cómoda , padecía dolor de cuello y con esta almohada ya duermo muy agusto , se las recomiendo 😜

The pillow is good form me when I am side sleeping. However, when I am lying on my back, the indent in the middle is not low enough and it strains my neck. It is smaller than I imagined. It is comfy to lie my head on.
It is a scam. So expensive but not worth it. Doesn’t help anything
